meanings.definition: A squid or cuttlefish used for food.
meanings.sent1: The calamary was delicious in the seafood pasta.
meanings.sent2: I ordered calamary rings at the restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The calamary decided to join the seafood party.
meanings.sent4: The calamary danced gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The chef prepared the calamary with care and expertise.

meanings.definition: A dish made from squid or cuttlefish.
meanings.sent1: The calamary dish was a hit at the dinner party.
meanings.sent2: I tried a new calamary recipe for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The calamary dish wore a tiny chef's hat.
meanings.sent4: The calamary dish was a work of art on the plate.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the calamary dish filled the kitchen.
